I don't understand this. Doesn't that message include the exact character
p=
osition at which the two strings stop matching? How much more context do
yo=
u want? :) Also, it's supposed to show 20 characters to the left of the
mis=
match and 60 to the right. If it does not, then that is definitely not
Alex=
's original patch.

As far as I know, there is no way to change this behavi=
or without changing
the framework source.

om getMessage in

t format, with "..." replacing initial and final parts of the

 equal between the "expected" and "found" values.
